Package com.example.networkmeup.dao

Interface EmployerDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmployerDAOMemory
public interface EmployerDAO
EmployerDAO interface outlines the methods that should be implemented by classes responsible for handling Employer data access operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    authenticate(Email email, Password password)
    Method to authenticate an employer based on provided email and password.

    Deletes the specified employer from the data source.

    Checks if the specified employer exists in the data source.

    getAll()
    Retrieves a list of all employers from the data source.

    Saves or updates the information of an employer in the data source.

  • Method Details

    • delete

      void delete(Employer employer)
      Deletes the specified employer from the data source.
      Parameters:
      employer - The Employer object to be deleted.

    • getAll

      ArrayList<Employer> getAll()
      Retrieves a list of all employers from the data source.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all the Employer objects.

    • save

      void save(Employer employer)
      Saves or updates the information of an employer in the data source.
      Parameters:
      employer - The Employer object to be saved or updated.

    • find

      boolean find(Employer employer)
      Checks if the specified employer exists in the data source.
      Parameters:
      employer - The Employer object to check for existence.
      Returns:
      True if the Employer exists, otherwise False.

    • getByEmail

      Employer getByEmail(Email email)
      Retrieves an Employer object based on the provided email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The Email object representing the email address of the employer.
      Returns:
      The Employer object associated with the provided email, if found; otherwise null.

    • authenticate

      boolean authenticate(Email email, Password password)
      Method to authenticate an employer based on provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employer for authentication.
      password - The password of the employer for authentication.
      Returns:
      True if the provided email and password match any stored employer's credentials, false otherwise.

    • getByJob

      Employer getByJob(Job job)
      Retrieves an Employer object based on the provided job.
      Parameters:
      job - The job of an employer.
      Returns:
      Employer object that has the specific job.
